# <a name="read-receipts"></a><span data-ttu-id="5347c-102">Läs kvitton</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5347c-102">Read receipts</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5347c-103">Så här efterfrågar du ett Läs kvitto eller leverans kvitto på ditt meddelande i Outlook på webben:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5347c-103">To request a read receipt or a delivery receipt for your message in Outlook on the web:</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="5347c-104">Markera de tre punkterna</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5347c-104">Select the three dots</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="5347c-105">högst upp i fönstret Skriv meddelande.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5347c-105">at the top of the message compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="5347c-106">Välj **Visa meddelande alternativ**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5347c-106">Select **Show message options**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="5347c-107">Välj **begära Läs kvitto** eller **begära ett leverans kvitto**, eller både och.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5347c-107">Select **Request a read receipt** or **Request a delivery receipt**, or both.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5347c-108">Om du vill ange hur Outlook svarar på begäran om Läs kvitton går du till</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5347c-108">To choose how Outlook responds to read receipt requests, go to</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' />
 <span data-ttu-id="5347c-109">**Inställningar**  >  för **Visa alla Outlook-inställningar**  >  **Meddelande hantering**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5347c-109">**Settings** > **View all Outlook settings** > **Message handling**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="5347c-110">Mer information finns i [Läs kvitton i Outlook på webben](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="5347c-110">For more information, see [Read receipts in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/e09af74d-3519-45fc-a680-37a538a92157).</span></span>
